Osejs.Information.Title: Fixed Axis Rotation in Space Frame
Osejs.Information.Author: Wolfgang Christian - Davidson College

Content.OneHTMLPage:
_default_ Rotation About a Fixed Axis true
./RotationAboutFixedAxis/RotationAboutFixedAxis.html

Variable.Name: tilt
Variable.Comment: tilt of body from axle normal

Variable.Name: a
Variable.Comment: width of box along x axis

Variable.Name: b
Variable.Comment: depth of box along y axis

Variable.Name: c
Variable.Comment: height of box along z axis

Variable.Name: phi
Variable.Comment: axle rotation angle; axle is along z axis in space frame

Variable.Name: LxSpace
Variable.Comment: x-component of angular momentum in space frame

Variable.Name: LySpace
Variable.Comment: y-component of angular momentum in space frame

Variable.Name: LzSpace
Variable.Comment: z-component of angular momentum in space frame

Variable.Name: N1Space
Variable.Comment: x-component of torque in space frame

Variable.Name: N2Space
Variable.Comment: y-component of torque in space frame

Variable.Name: N3Space
Variable.Comment: z-component of torque in space frame
